subject: Coaches and Managers
Football
College Athletics
Football (College)
organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: Rutgers introduced its new head football coach, Kyle Flood, on Tuesday, and he has already had to face the challenge of keeping intact his team’s highly regarded recruiting class.
snippet: Rutgers introduced its new head football coach, Kyle Flood, on Tuesday, and he has already had to face the challenge of keeping intact his team’s highly regarded recruiting class.
